title: Subchapter E - WATER REGULATION
content:
Subchapter E - WATER REGULATION
State Regulations

Part 595 - Releases Of Hazardous Substances (Repealed)

Part 596 - [Repealed] (§ 596.1 to 596.4)

Part 597 - Hazardous Substances Identification, Release Prohibition, And Release Reporting (§ 597.1 to 597.4)

Part 598 - Handling and Storage of Hazardous Substances (Subpart 598-1 to 598-6)

Part 599 - [Repealed] (§ 599.1 to 599.18)

Part 600 - Applications For Licenses And Preliminary Permits Under The Water Power Act

Part 601 - Water Withdrawal Permiting, Reporting And Registration (exclusive Of Long Island Wells Regulated Under Part 602 Of This Title) (§ 601.1 to 601.24)

Part 602 - Applications For Long Island Wells (§ 602.0 to 602.6)

Part 603 - Applications For Fixation Of Water Rates (§ 603.1 to 603.10)

Part 604 - Applications For Approval Of Formation Of County Water Authorities (§ 604.1 to 604.8)

Part 605 - Applications For The Diversion Or Use Of Water For Purposes Other Than Hydro-electric Power Projects (§ 605.1 to 605.10)

Part 606 - Use, Operation And Maintenance Of Great Sacandaga Lake (formerly The Sacandaga Reservoir)

Part 607 - State Aid To Counties In Conjunction With Small Watershed Protection And Flood Prevention Projects (§ 607.1 to 607.7)

Part 608 - USE AND PROTECTION OF WATERS (§ 608.1 to 608.11)

Part 609 - Reclassification Of Waters (§ 609.0 to 609.8)

Part 610 - Certification Of Onshore Major Facilities (§ 610.1 to 610.6)

Part 611 - Environmental Priorities And Procedures In Petroleum Cleanup And Removal (§ 611.1 to 611.16)

Part 612 - Registration Of Petroleum Storage Facilities (Repealed)

Part 613 - Petroleum Bulk Storage (Subpart 613-1 to 613-8)

Part 614 - Standards For New And Substantially Modified Petroleum Storage Facilities (Repealed)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
